content: रिक्थं [रिच्-थक्] {@--1@} Inheritance, bequest, property left at death; (in law) unobstructed property; विभजेरन् सुताः पित्रोरूर्ध्वं रिक्थमृणं समं <ls>Y. 1. 117</ls>; <ls>Ms. 9. 104</ls>; ननु गर्भः पित्र्यं रिक्थमर्हति <ls>Ś. 6.</ls> {@--2@} Property in general, wealth, possessions; <ls>Ms. 8. 27.</ls> {@--3@} Gold.
